bibl.title: The Scroll and the Marble. Studies in Reading and Reception in Hellenistic Poetry.
bibl.note: Reproduction de 11 articles (1993-2005), revus et mis à jour, et 2 contributions inédites. - Pp. 1-7: Introduction; - 293-304: Indices.
BING Peter, The Scroll and the Marble. Studies in Reading and Reception in Hellenistic Poetry.
Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan Press, 2009, 8°, xii-304 pp., 5 figg. ISBN 978-0-472-11632-4. $65.
